function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on COVID-19 and digital technologies may overlook other contagious diseases that pose a risk to public health.","Impact":"Potential for failure to address other important public health risks and potential for neglect of preparedness for future outbreaks of different infectious diseases.","Mitigation":"Broaden the scope of research to include a comprehensive approach to public health and infectious diseases, not limited to COVID-19, and prioritize preparedness for future outbreaks.","Technologies":"Comprehensive data analysis and surveillance systems for monitoring multiple infectious diseases, advanced diagnostic tools for disease detection.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, government agencies."}]}
